heading.line2Before: Experience the infinite possibilities of XRP

content.paragraph1: XRP Tokyo 2026 is Japan's premier XRP & Web3 conference representing Asia.
content.paragraph2: This event is held as an official event of TEAMZ Web3/AI Summit 2026, bringing together leaders, developers, investors, companies, and community members from Japan and around the world who are driving the XRP and XRP Ledger ecosystem.
content.paragraph3: XRP Tokyo 2026 is a milestone event for the XRP community in Japan's Web3 scene.

hubSection.description: XRP Tokyo is a global conference focused on the XRP Ledger ecosystem, institutional blockchain adoption, and real-world on-chain use cases.

redCarpetSection.description: XRP Tokyo is a global conference focused on the XRP Ledger ecosystem, institutional blockchain adoption, and real-world on-chain use cases.

journeySection.heading: THE JOURNEY BEGINS
journeySection.subtext: Join us in Tokyo for the most influential XRP event of 2026.
